38.eng-name: The Book of Manners and Etiquette

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Yazid b. Khusaifa with the same chain of transmitters but with this addition:Abu Sa'id said: So I stood up, and went to 'Umar and gave witness (to what Abu Musa had said)

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Permission To Enter A House
